title: Halloween Skins
body: Any idea when the Halloween skins are available? im wanting to buy some just need to know when they are available

replies.body:
Should be out with the next patch :)- this will be next week i think?
look up patch dates to be sure
This will probably be correct as the slayer jinx and pantheon are coming out in the next patch so i am expecting they will be coming out at the same time.
